attributes.action: introduce legislation to force Airlines to pay any refund due on cancelled tickets within 28 days of cancellation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Airlines take an outrageous length of time to refund money on cancelled tickets, normally between 8 and 13 weeks. There is no justification for this and they should refund any money owing in a timely manner.
